nodes.text: The Makem Te fueling station was a fueling station in orbit around the planet Makem Te in the Makem system.

The Galactic Republic built the structure and placed it in orbit around the planet sometime after the mapping of the rimward portions of the Perlemian Trade Route. The station had facilities for several crew members, and the Republic sent scientists to man it.

During the Yuuzhan Vong War, the invaders wrenched the station from its orbit and sent it crashing to the surface of Makem Te. It landed near the world's giant cemetery, the Tract, just missing a direct collision.
